title: Graph Portfolio
description: Visual portfolio using interactive tags and bubbles.
fullDescription: Graph Portfolio is a dynamic, interactive interface built using React and D3. It visualizes projects as bubbles categorized by tags, allowing users to filter and explore visually.

title: Personal Blog
description: A blog to share my thoughts and experiences.
fullDescription: Built with React and TypeScript, this blog supports markdown content, dark mode, and a clean writing-focused layout.

title: E-commerce Store
description: An online store built with React and Redux.
fullDescription: A responsive e-commerce platform featuring a product catalog, cart functionality, and checkout flow. Integrated with Stripe for payment.

title: Weather App
description: A weather application that fetches data from a weather API.
fullDescription: Simple weather app that pulls data from OpenWeather API. Features temperature toggling and search history saved in localStorage.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio showcasing my projects and skills.
fullDescription: A sleek developer portfolio with sections for projects, resume, and contact. Responsive, accessible, and deployed via GitHub Pages.
